lead_paragraph: After a night of wining and dining 50 of China's richest people in the name of promoting philanthropy, Warren E. Buffett and Bill Gates told a horde of journalists on Thursday that the biggest difference between eating with Chinese tycoons and Western ones was the food.

headline.main: Gates and Buffett Say Charity Meeting a Success

abstract: After a night of wining and dining 50 of China's richest people in the name of promoting philanthropy, Warren E. Buffett and Bill Gates told a horde of journalists on Thursday that the biggest difference between eating with Chinese tycoons and Western ones was the food.
